name: ligue_1_standings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ligue_1_standings.
Tool description: French Ligue 1 Standings & Table
API description: Fetches the Ligue 1 standings for a given season using the RapidAPI service.

season.description: The season for which to fetch the standings (e.g., '2022'). Defaults to None.
